name: zaggino.brackets-eslint
title: ESLint (es6jsx)
description: Adds ESLint support to Brackets (es6jsx branch)

scripts.upgrade: git submodule update --init && npm run upgrade-yaml && npm run upgrade-eslint
scripts.upgrade-yaml: cd js-yaml && git fetch origin && git checkout origin/master && cd .. && grunt copyyaml
scripts.upgrade-eslint: cd eslint && git fetch origin && git checkout origin/es6jsx && npm update && npm run browserify && cd .. && grunt copyeslint
